about_the_game:
You can play the beginning of the story about 1 hour (6 chapters) in demo version.




Gwan Moon High School : The Ghost Gate
GMH is a horror visual novel with a point & click adventure game system.
It tells the horrid story of what happened overnight and a past that is related to it in modern Korea.



The high school built on the ghost gate...The spiritual energy awakens when the dark moon rises.

To see if the ghost stories of the school are true, to get their stuffs back that they left at school...High school students return to school in the middle of the night, for their own individual motives and start to panic when they encounter ghostly sightings. They are unable to find friends who went there together and also cannot leave the premises. The students then try to disclose the truth behind the ghost stories with a few clues...



  • Horror Visual Novel Game with Point & Click Adventure system.
  • The main episodes are 2 flows in parallel.
  • The side episodes for looking at characters' past.
  • Various collectibles such as After Stories of characters, Character Information and so on.
  • Play time : About 7 hours.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains non-realistic depictions of violence and gore.

detailed_description:
Streaming Mode

Hello, this is Studio AWE.

As it turns out, more people wanted to stream than we had expected. So, we've decided to come up with "Streaming Mode" as a way to allow you to stream, just with a couple of restrictions.

Therefore,

if you are planning to live stream or record any videos with the purpose of uploading them, you must turn "Streaming Mode" ON beforehand.


Streaming Mode can be toggled at the bottom of the "Options" screen accessible from the title screen.


Please note that you cannot change modes between "Streaming Mode" and normal mode during the course of the game, so please be careful.

The features of the "Streaming Mode" are as follows.

  • The "Streaming Mode" indicator text has been added in the lower-left corner of the dialogue window.
  • You can view all of the main episodes.
  • You cannot, however, view side episodes with the exception of "Shin Hyo Jin", "Truth".
  • You also cannot view any of the "After Stories" and "Another Story".
It would be greatly appreciated if streamers and viewers were to abide and respect this new streaming policy. I would also like to take this chance to thank all the streamers who have tolerated our embargo period.

Thank you.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-Core or higher.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

reviews:
“Ever obsess over rumors? Should have studied instead in GMH! You must assess, choose and look for answers! A touchingly tragic story of deep-seated fears naive pupils may hold for their futures~”
8/10 – DaRevieweD
short_description: High school students return well after hours, each with their own agenda and an ominous feeling. Come midnight...The fears deep inside become reality.
